View Text: Former Encana chief executive Gwyn Morgan is quietly backing a network of think tanks, astroturf groups and rightwing media disputing the climate crisis.

View Title: Morgan's Foundation Has Donated to Various Atlas Network Groups
View Text: Text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text.

View Title: Morgan Is a Member of the Fraser Institute
View Text: Morgan has been listed on the board of directors at the Fraser Institute, an Atlas Network member organization, as recently as 2023.

View Title: Charles Koch Donated to Fraser and Other Atlas Groups
View Text: Text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text.

View Title: The Same Atlas Groups Have Received Funding From The Aurea Foundation
View Text: The Aurea Foundation, which was run by Andrew Coyne until it ceased operations, donated to many of the same Atlas groups that Morgan has donated to. Coyne, like Morgan, is a contributor to the National Post.

View Title: Morgan Donates to the Canada Strong and Free Network
View Text: The Canada Strong and Free Network, an organization funding regional Canadian campaign front groups, received donations from Morgan.
Morgan has also been involved in the Canadian media space, contributing to the National Post/Financial Post, and funding Juno News (formerly True North).

View Title: Morgan and Juno News / True North
View Text: Text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text text.
Morgan backed Pierre Poilievre in the recent election.

View Title: How This Is Connected to Oil & Gas
View Text: The Fraser Institute has received regular donations from Imperial Oil, which has also donated to fellow Atlas partner Macdonald Laurier Institute.
Imperial is a key member of Pathways Alliance...
Pathways member Cenovus has given to the Indigenous Resource Network and Canada Action...
Canadian Natural Resources, a Pathways member, gave to Indian Resource Council...
